name: AKAL
overview:
AKAL is a leading provider of technology solutions and services for business and home users.

AKAL partners with customers to support their IT infrastructure and offer e-business application development, implementation, management and support for sharing business information, maintaining business relationships, and conducting business transactions over the Web.

Akal is ISO 9001:2008 certified and complies with Six Sigma & ITIL best practices. AKAL’s name is synonymous with integrity, quality and reliability. It’s a recognized name the customers know and trust.

Experience: With over 12 years of IT service provisioning, AKAL’s customers include organizations across a host of industries. Customers value their expertise, experience and complete dedication to their projects.

Expertise: AKAL’s competency includes engineers and programmers with average experience levels ranging from 3-20 years and holding certifications such as MCSE, MCP, CCNA, RHCLE, OCDBA and more. Their skill proficiency levels include development on Microsoft/Java platforms, networking, security, unified communications and enterprise support.

Comprehensive: With offices in USA & India, AKAL has a growing infrastructure with contact center, field support and fulfillment facilities in more than 16 cities.

More specifically, what sets AKAL apart is their commitment to methodologies & best practices. They think like their customers and believe in long term partnerships, continually improving service quality while reducing costs.
